task.title: Modifying a meeting
task.shortdesc: You can edit the meeting options for an existing meeting.

context.p: You can edit all available options except the meeting name.

step.cmd: Click the Sametime add-in logo and select Add Meeting.
step.info: A list of your meetings displays.

step.cmd: Click the edit icon () next to the meeting that you want to change.
step.info: You can change the settings related to the meeting. When you are finished with changes, click Save.

step.cmd: Click Save in the Outlook event to save the meeting information in the event.
